GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.58
GSD.description:
ipv4: Fix data-races around sysctl_fib_multipath_hash_fields.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.58 by commit 36f5b86f309b3b11295d087cd7433f1c897caf94, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit ce5c9c20d364f156c885efed8c71fca2945db00f. For more details please see the references link.
